header.description: No header-level aggregates or constants required for this report.

rows.description: Job execution records from app_job_runs, showing ID, job reference, timestamps, duration, rows processed, and performance metrics.

totals.description: No totals row required for this report.

semantics: All tokens map directly to app_job_runs columns. Three tokens (status, error_message, run_type) are unresolved as the columns do not exist in the current schema. These will render as empty cells unless the schema is extended.
transformations: No reshaping or unpivoting required â€” direct row iteration over app_job_runs.
Unresolved tokens will render empty unless schema is extended or joins are added.
